description: This React component file implements an authentication gating component 'AuthGate' that wraps protected content and an internal 'AuthScreen' component for user sign-in and sign-up functionalities using email and password. It leverages an authentication context 'useAuth' for managing auth state and actions.

methods.name: AuthGate({ children })
methods.description: A React component that renders its children if the user is authenticated; otherwise, it shows a loading indicator or an authentication screen.

methods.name: AuthScreen()
methods.description: A React component that manages user sign-in/sign-up forms with email and password, handling form state and submission.

methods.name: submit(e)
methods.description: Handles the form submission event, performs authentication actions based on mode (sign-in or sign-up), and manages errors.
